Package suncertify

This package contains classes related to the URLyBird program that do not belong in any particular package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ClientToServerConnection The methods that clients can invoke on servers.
Controller An MVC controller.
NetworkServer A network server responsible for sharing a server connection.
ProgressListener A ProgressListener is used to observe a task that may take a long time.
RecordModificationPolicy Business logic to determine if a given record should be modifiable by a user.
ServerToClientConnection The methods that a server can invoke on a client that is connected to it.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMenuBar<E> Menu bar superclass for URLyBird GUI.
Criterion A search request criterion for a single database field.
ErrorDialog Utility class for displaying error dialog boxes.
HelpPanel A simple non-modal panel to display HTML files.
IconFactory A simple utility class to load image icons.
PersistentConfiguration Simple class to allow configuration options to be saved to a file, and loaded from a file.
RMINetworkServer An RMI network server responsible for providing an RMI connection.
StartupProblem The possible problems we could have when parsing the command line arguments when starting up the URLyBird program.
StringMatchCriterion Criterion for String matching.
URLyBirdLauncher Main class for launching the URLyBird 1.3.2 application.
URLyBirdRecordModificationPolicy Determines whether a given record is modifiable according to the URLyBird business rules.
View Superclass for URLyBird MVC view classes.
WidgetFactory Helper class for GUI widgets.
 

Enum Summary
SavedParameter The configuration settings that can be saved to file.
URLyBirdErrors The known errors that can occur in the URLyBird program.
 

Exception Summary
RecordNotLockedException Checked exception to indicate that a client has attempted to alter a record that they do not own the lock for.
RecordNotModifiableException Checked exception to indicate that a record could not be modified.
ServerNotRunningException Checked exception to indicate that the server was expected to be running, but was found to be not running.
StaleRecordException Checked exception to indicate that a client's version of a record has become out of date, perhaps by being changed by another client.
 

Package suncertify Description

This package contains classes related to the URLyBird program that do not belong in any particular package. The main class to launch the program is in this package.
